text: Sore wa shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu shimo be ni taishi, arra ga tsutaeru kippodearu. Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa sorenitaishite, nani no hoshu mo anata gata ni motomete wa inai. Watashi wa anata gata no kinshin to shite no joai dake o motomeru. Sorede dare demo, zenko o nasu mono ni wa, sore ni taishi sarani yoimono ga atae rareru. Hontoni arra wa, kan'yo ni shite yoku kansha sa reru katadearu
